summary: Detail-oriented Data Automation & Integration Analyst with 2.5+ years supporting revenue operations through data-driven automation, ETL workflows, system integration, and reporting. Proficient in Python, SQL, and REST API development to optimize business processes across CPQ, CRM, and ERP platforms. Skilled at translating stakeholder needs into scalable technical solutions. Currently pursuing Salesforce Administrator certification to expand CRM and data capabilities.

experience.title: Pricing Data & Systems Integration Oracle CPQ Developer
experience.description: Supported global sales operations by building and maintaining automations and product logic across Oracle CPQ, Salesforce CRM, ERP, and pricing systems. Configured Oracle CPQ for multiple product lines, including guided selling, approval workflows, and custom BML rules. Maintained and enhanced CPQ â†” Salesforce CRM integrations, including user-level fixes and field mapping. Assisted with REST API connections between CPQ and ERP for pricing, approvals, and order submissions. Reduced manual quoting and reporting tasks by optimizing CRM and CPQ workflows. Wrote Python and SQL scripts to support pricing analysis, quote validation, and margin reporting. Developed Excel tools and Power Query dashboards to automate quote tracking and sales KPIs. Participated in Agile sprints using Jira and Azure DevOps for enhancement tracking and UAT. Provided documentation and light user support for 200+ global users in sales and operations teams. Collaborated with sales, IT, and finance stakeholders to align system functionality with business needs.

experience.title: Business Systems Analyst & Data Automation Specialist
experience.description: Automated CPQ processes using Python, SQL, and Excel VBA, reducing manual quote validation and pricing efforts by 50%. Built and maintained REST API integrations across Oracle CPQ, Salesforce CRM, and ERP systems (JD Edwards, Great Plains) for real-time data synchronization. Developed custom pricing rules, approval workflows, and guided selling flows in Oracle CPQ to support complex product configurations and speed up quoting cycles. Delivered SQL-based sales dashboards to visualize quote status, pricing trends, and KPIs for executive leadership. Led UAT testing, stakeholder demos, and user training for 100+ global sales and operations users, increasing adoption and reducing errors. Participated in Agile development cycles, sprint planning, backlog grooming, and process documentation with Jira and Azure DevOps. Authored detailed technical documentation on API workflows, pricing logic, and business processes to support internal knowledge transfer and system maintenance.

experience.title: Business Systems Developer/Analyst Intern
experience.description: Collaborated with Solution Architects and MuleSoft Business Analysts to gather, validate, and document client requirements for complex enterprise integration projects. Supported requirements analysis and authored clear documentation covering scope, use cases, and acceptance criteria for customer implementations. Participated in Agile delivery ceremonies and contributed to effort estimation, project scoping, and client communication best practices. Engaged in discovery sessions and stakeholder interviews to align technical solutions with business objectives. Gained hands-on experience with Salesforce ecosystem tools, integration planning, and project documentation standards. Contributed to internal knowledge bases by documenting business process flows, user stories, and lessons learned from client engagements. Developed foundational skills in stakeholder management, solution scoping, and functional requirements documentation.

certifications: Salesforce Certified Administrator (In Progress - Est. August 2025)
CPQ Developer 2024 Certified Implementation Professional - Oracle Cloud

projects.name: Full Stack Task Manager
projects.description: Built task management application with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and JWT authentication. Deployed on AWS EC2 with Docker.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Developed React frontend integrated with OpenWeatherMap API, highlighting data fetching and presentation skills.

projects.name: StockTrack - Real-Time Inventory Management
projects.description: Designed and implemented a web-based inventory management system to enable real-time stock tracking and order processing. Built a RESTful API for real-time integration with supplier databases, reducing order fulfillment times by 30%. Created user-friendly dashboards with custom filtering options, improving data accessibility and helping team members reduce order processing times by 25%.

projects.name: API Guard - API Monitoring Tool
projects.description: Created an API monitoring tool to track system health, latency, and performance of critical endpoints. Built a custom alerting system that triggers notifications based on predefined thresholds, improving response times to API issues by 40%. Conducted load testing and optimized database queries to reduce latency, resulting in a more resilient API infrastructure and a 20% reduction in system downtime.

projects.name: Automated Quote Generation System
projects.description: Developed an automation tool to streamline the process of generating quotes within Oracle CPQ, reducing generation time by 40%. Implemented data validation and error-checking mechanisms, ensuring 100% accuracy in generated quotes. Led the tool deployment across three business units, achieving widespread adoption and a 25% boost in productivity across departments.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Business Computer Information Systems, Minor in Marketing Business Analytics
